attributes.action: to NOT legalise the use of the Mosquito device (or similar).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Mosquito device is nothing more than indiscriminate noise pollutant. Whilst it may dissuade younger persons from congregating in areas it is also a nuisance against all young persons and those adults who still have acute hearing.
Accordingly not only do these devices breach the rights of many they remain a noise nuisance and we ask the Prime Minister not to give these any legal status in respect of their permitted use.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
